TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项时将引发事件创建控件。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 中的项时将引发事件控件绑定到数据源。The event is raised when an item in the control is bound to a data source. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件要在其中显示顺序中的项控件中创建。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which the items in the control are created. span.span: The referenced item in the control when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式访问引用中的项控制何时引发事件。Use this property to programmatically access the item referenced in the control when the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性要在其中显示顺序中的项控件中创建。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the order in which the items in the control are created.
